Entries.DialogueText: Ah... That's the perfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!
Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.
Somethin' tells me you could use it, lad.
Somethin' tells me you could use it, miss.
*chomp*... Yep, that's real gold alright. Heh! What a gift!
The horror! ...What kind of monster is this?
Aye... A timeless classic. Brings a tear to me eye, with every read. A fisherman can never have too many copies! Thank ye.
Thank ye! This'll be perfect winter reading. Ah, and it even smells of the sea...
Ah, 'Bait And Bobber'... Every angler ought to have a subscription, but it costs a pretty penny. Taught me a lot of good fishin' tips over the years. Thanks!
By the stem o' me pipe... a cup o' Stardrop Tea! And here I thought it was only the stuff of mermaid legend. Thank you kindly.
Ah, this stuff warms the ol' bones. Thank you.
Wow, I got a low score. I guess Mayor Lewis isn't much of a fish man. Oh well...
I don't have high hopes of winning... the fish look nice but they don't exactly smell great...
So, you finally conquered the Crimsonfish! That fish has been taunting me for many years. He nearly nibbled through the wood under me house!
Ah, you caught the Angler, did ya? A good 'first step' into the world o' rare fish, that one.
By the stem o' me pipe... You actually caught 'the Legend'. I never thought I'd see the day...
Well, lad, you've done it... You're the best fisherman this valley's seen in a long time...
Well, miss, you've done it... You're the best angler this valley's seen in a long time...
*sniff* *sniff*... Something tells me you've been fishin' in the sewers, lad.
*sniff* *sniff*... Something tells me you've been fishin' in the sewers, miss.
It's an unconventional approach, to be sure. There's legend of gargantuan carp, twisted into monsters from the toxic sludge...
Ah, so you finally snagged the Glacierfish... That's one of the slipperiest fish I've ever encountered!
How many tries did it take ya?
If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook.
I'm a simple man... when my pipe is full, I'm happy. When my pipe is empty... well, then I just fill 'er up again.
*sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?
Yer a ${man
lady}$ after me own heart, . Hah!
Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast!
Aye... I hope these weird rains don't bother the fish... It could ruin me life!
If the fish like these rains, then I like 'em, too.
Well, the fish seem as healthy as ever. In fact, I swear they've been biting with extra vigor!
Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' in to the valley. It's not very common these days.
Giving up the ${bachelor
single}$ life, eh?
Just don't forget to make time for fishing...
Ahoy there, son.
Ahoy there, lass.
Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?
Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it.
Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, lad.
Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, miss.
I'll just finish me pipe, and head over.
If the local fishing scene got a bit more lively, I might expand the shop's stock.
How's the fishing life going for ya?
I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run.
Tomorrow is the annual Trout Derby... Aye, it's a freshwater enthusiast's dream!
Anglers from all over the world will be here to catch our beautiful Rainbow Trout...
I'd better see you out there, lad!
I hope to see you out there!
For the next two days, I'll only be manning the shop for one hour, starting at 9am. So if you really need somethin', you can come by then.
It's the big day! I've got all me equipment tuned to catch Trout...
Good luck out there!
How's the Derby treatin' ya so far?
I've found plenty o' Golden Tags, meself... but it's not over yet!
If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.
Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.
There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while.
Hey, it's my skipper, !
I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it.
*mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret.
There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.
You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite.
A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that.
The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.
The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain.
I've heard a rumor that a special kind of fish can be found in the pools between waterfalls...
If you can reach it with yer rod, that is...
Tomorrow, at the beach, is the start of a little gathering... called 'SquidFest'.
Aye... tis' a difficult catch, the squid. But I trust that you've developed a knack for the sport, by now.
Don't give up just yet! There's more squid in these waters...
It warms me ol' winter heart to see all these anglers gathered here, all for the love o' fishing...
Hehe... they love it... Look at 'em go!
I was just thinkin' of you, lad.
I was just thinkin' of you, miss.
This bug meat you found is perfect!
Hehe... When I said 'fresh', I didn't expect it to still be wrigglin'!
But I'm not complaining! The fish love it... Hehehe...
As a way of saying 'thanks', I wanted to teach you an old fisherman's secret... My ol' Pappy taught me this on a fishing trip many years ago.
Using that bobber will attract higher quality fish.
That means more money in yer pocket, ${lad
lass}$. Hehe...
Ahoy!
Learned how to craft 'Quality Bobber'
Got one!
Ah... it's a good thing you turned up, lad.
Ah... It's a good thing you turned up, miss.
I've got a... a bit of a problem I could use a hand with...
Er... It'd be best if I just showed ya...
Take a deep breath, now.
As you can see...
And smell... heh...
The old girls 'ran wild' last night... heh...
My experiment needs a little work...
Aye... These are the finest, meatiest crabs you'll ever set yer eyes on.
They be a little too feisty, though...
Goodbye, me sweet ladies...
Aye...
Ahoy there, miss.
Heard there was a newcomer in town... Good to finally meet ya.
Ah... I'm still tryin' to unwind from a month out on the salty seas...
It was a big haul! I sold a lot of good fish.
Finally saved enough to buy me a new rod.
Here, I want you to have my old fishing rod.
It's important to me that the art o' fishing stays alive. And hey, maybe you'll buy somethin' from the shop once in a while.
There's good water here in the valley. All kinds o' fish.
Oh yeah. My shop's back open now, so come by if you need supplies.
I'll also buy anything you catch.
'If it smells, it sells'. Heh heh. That's what my ol' Pappy used to say, anyway.
Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?
She was me father's boat... Served him well for over 50 years.
But now she can barely stay afloat.
I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, ${lad
miss}$.
Aye... 200 pieces of hardwood to patch the hull would be a good start.
But we'll also need to get the ticket machine back up, and the iridium anchor repaired.
If I could get me hands on the right materials, and repair the ol' girl... well, then I could take you to the Fern Islands.
Volcanic islands full of strange parrots, they say...
Aye... I thought you would, ${lad
I'll leave this door unlocked for ya... you can come drop off the materials whenever you like.
Alright, suit yourself...
If you have a change of heart, you can always come back and help out. I'll leave this door unlocked, anyhow.
Good morning, ${lad
miss}$!
Sorry to bother you so early, but, eh... I've noticed you haven't been fishing much.
Aye... it can be difficult to get into the sport, for a beginner.
So, I figured I'd give you a few pointers... maybe it'll help you develop yer sea legs!
So, you'll want to hold the rod like this, see?...
One more thing... I wanted to give you this.
It's called a 'training rod'. It should make catching fish a lot easier.
Just be aware that you'll only be able to catch basic fish with this. But it's a great way to develop your skills early on!
I hope you'll give fishing another try. Once you get the hang of it, you'll be having a great time.
Willy gave you a quick lesson on fishing basics.
You feel more confident already!
Come in... make yourself at home...
Aye... that's good stuff, there. The fish go crazy for it.
Just... eh... make sure to wash yer hands good after dipping them in those juices...
The aroma has been known to linger for up to seven weeks, ${lad
miss}$...
So... you been catching a lot o' fish?
Aye... well, business has been tough, lately.
It all started about the same time that old community center fell to ruin... me fish just don't sell like they used to...
I've been working double-time just to make ends meet!
No time for me own projects...
But, if things picked back up around here, I might have the time to show ya somethin'...
Heh heh... yep. She's back there... an 'old friend' that's seen better days...
Some day, ${lad
miss}$... you'll see what I mean.
Aha! A ${man
lady}$ after me own heart...
You can always ${trust a fisherman
count on a lady who fishes}$...
That's what me ol' Pappy used to say, at least. Haha!
Well, keep it goin'... if you can catch every fish in these waters, I've got a special prize waitin' for ye...
Not the fishin' type, eh? That's too bad...
Yes, it's a difficult sport... especially for a beginner.
Have you tried the 'Training Rod'? I sell them right here, at a very low price.
You should try using a 'Training Rod' until you get a little more experienced.
Aye, lad... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of us.
After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I talked to Linus here and hatched a little plan.
Go on, Linus... tell him.
I can take you back for a visit any time!
But, lad.... You can't live here forever...
You know, there are other children back home, too. I'm sure they'd love to meet ya...
What do you think, ?
Well, let's not forget... the choice is really up to Leo...
I understand. This is Leo's home, after all.
Poor lad...
I wonder if there's some way to help...
Hi, .
It's odd... I'm not sure what caused this boulder to disappear.
This stream is flowing from deep within the mountain.
Hey! Do you see that glistening in the water?
Yes... that's quality ore!
The flow of water must be carrying it out of the mountain.
You know what this means, right?
It means we can start panning for ore!
Here, I've got an extra pan in my backpack... why don't you take it?
If you ever see ore glistening in the water, use that pan and see what you find.
Got one, lad!
The mushrooms are a tad chewier than last year...
Hmm...
Aye, lad

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H
Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... That I do. We showed up one morning and the place was crawlin' with 'em.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Me?
So I stopped by Willy's the other day and bought {1} {2}. I've never seen one so fresh!
So I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!
He told me you caught it yourself... I'm impressed!
Anyways...
So I stopped by Willy's the other day and bought {1} {2}. He said you caught it yourself!
I cooked it up for dinner last night... and, uh... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where you found that thing...
Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad!
Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, lad.
Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, miss.
You really had me worried... I thought you were a goner! Be a little more careful out there...
The island can be a dangerous place.
Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...
It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.
It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.
Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...
It smelled kind of fishy, but it was alright.
I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on a 'chum-bucket' sale for only {3}g.
It was {4}! No wonder Willy was practically giving that {5} away...
I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.
It was actually pretty {4}.
I couldn't pass up that great price.
So I was at Willy's other day and he showed me {1} {2} you brought in.
I cooked it up for dinner with some lemon and a side of rice pilaf. Pretty good!
Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on...
Are you setting up a grange display, ? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from !
I managed to catch several iridium-quality beauties, just in time for this year's fair!After our grange displays are judged I'll have to try my hand at the fishing game tent.
I'd watch yer back, lad... something terrible's in that maze...
I'd watch yer back, miss... something terrible's in that maze...
Sometimes I'll hide an egg too well and no one finds it...Well, until summer rolls around. Then the hot air starts to bring out the rotten smell... Hehe.
Aye... on rainy days, you'll find catfish in these waters. They're a challenging catch, but well worth the effort!
I should've brought my fishing pole.
Aye, these waters be teeming with big fish. Shame I didn't bring me rod!
Hi there, . Taking a breather?To tell you the truth, I'd rather be fishing right now.
Don't worry, I'll be back for the soup... I'm just enjoying a tender moment with me pipe!
Most night-fish would be scared of the light... these are strange ones.
It's an old fisherman's rule... if you ever fish up a moonlight jelly, you gotta throw her back into the sea.

'Do you want to hear the Legend of the Winter Star?_Yes_In the night sky of winter, there is a bright star only visible from this valley. No one knows why this is... but in times of old people would come from far and wide to see it.*They believed that anyone who laid eyes on the Winter Star would be blessed with good fortune. Some even claim that the mysterious fruit known as =Stardrop is connected to the Winter Star in some way._No thanks_Suit yourself.'
I'm a simple man, ... I'm thankful for a solid roof over me head, and a hot can o' beans in the mornin'!
'Hey, . Ready for some ice fishing?_Yes. I'll do my best!_That's the spirit!_Yes, and I'm going to beat you!_We'll see._To be honest, no. I'm bad at fishing._Well, then think of it as good practice!'
Aye, the whole town'll be watchin' our little tournament today. Let's give them all a good show.
This is great! If only me ol' Pappy was around. He'd go nuts for this.
This looks great. Thank you!
Hmmm... You like stuff like this? Huh.
... *sniff*... Well I guess I can toss it into the chum bucket.
A gift! Thanks.
